## IconProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IconProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [backgroundColor](./ui-icons.iconprops.backgroundcolor.md) | <code>string</code> | The background color to set for the icon |
|  [color](./ui-icons.iconprops.color.md) | <code>string</code> | The color to set the icon |
|  [size](./ui-icons.iconprops.size.md) | <code>string &#124; number</code> | The size of the icon |
|  [styles](./ui-icons.iconprops.styles.md) | <code>RemirrorInterpolation</code> | Custom styles to add to the icon |
|  [variant](./ui-icons.iconprops.variant.md) | <code>KeyOfThemeVariant&lt;'remirror:icons'&gt;</code> | Whether to reverse the color and the background color of the icon. |
